Content.Text: Hellooo! <MYNAME>, you home? It's me, Fritz!
Hello. It's Klaus. Do you have a moment?
Yoooo! <MYNAME>, are you in?

Salutations! It's me, Mistel. I'm sorry to drop by
unannounced, but do you have a moment to
spare?
Hi. Got a minute?

Hi there. I'm usually not one to barge in, but do
you have a minute?

I know you are home, <MYNAME>. You wouldn't
leave a lady waiting outside, would you?
Hello there. It's me, Iris. Do you have a minute?

Hi! I hate to drop in on you like this, but do you
have a minute?

Heya! I'd like to talk to you for a minute. Can you
come out, please?

Greetings. It's Angela. I'm terribly sorry to disturb
you, but I have something I would like to give
you.

Heeeeeeeeeey...you in there? Can you come out
for a second?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's White Day, right? So I brought you a
present as thanks for what you got me last time!

<PAGE>
I hope you like it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I thought I might drop by and give you a gift in
return for the thoughtful present you gave me for
Valentine's Day. I hope you like it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here ya go! This is just a little thanks for thinking
of me last Valentine's Day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what today is?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's White Day, of course. I brought a present for
you in thanks for the gift you gave me on
Valentine's Day. I hope you like it.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's White Day, y'know. Since you got me
something for Valentine's Day, I got something
for you this time.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since today's White Day, I thought I'd bring you
a present. After all, you were sweet enough to
think of me on Valentine's Day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here is your present. Why the funny look? You
DID give me a gift on White Day, and today is
Valentine's Day. You do remember that, correct?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since today is Valentine's Day, and you were
thoughtful enough to give me something on
White Day...here. This is for you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since today's Valentine's Day and you were nice
enough to give me something on White Day, I
brought you a present! I hope you like it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is Valentine's Day. Since you gave me a
present on White Day, it seems only right I give
you something today.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since you were kind enough to think of me on
White Day, I have brought you something today.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Er, h-here. You got me a present for White Day,
so I, um, got you something today. I hope you
like it.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really liked what you got for me, so I tried to
make this as best I could for ya! It's my thanks
for everything, so I hope you really enjoy it. 
<PAGE>
I'll catch ya 'round!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So I gave the hand-made thing a shot this time,
and I think it turned out okay. Sorry if it's not
quite up to snuff, though.
<PAGE>
Anyways, I'd better be off. See ya!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Consider this a token of my feelings for you. It's
the least I can do after that wonderful dessert.
Forgive me if it's a touch too sweet.
<PAGE>
I look forward to spending another year in your
wonderful company.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The dessert I received from you was excellent.
Consider this a token of my thanks. Please feel
free to enjoy it with your family.
<PAGE>
Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I loved what you got for me, so I rolled up my
sleeves and made this just for you. I hope you
like it.
<PAGE>
Anyways, I've got to get going.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't hog 'em all for yourself, though. Share
some with <CHARANAME0>, too.  Anyway, I'd
better go. See you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You...are aware of the meaning behind White
Day, correct? I brought you this in return for the
gift you got me on Valentine's Day.
<PAGE>
Well then, I'll be on my way.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much for the present you got for
me on Valentine's Day. Please give my best to
<CHARANAME0>, as well.
<PAGE>
Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I got what you were saying when you got me
that present on Valentine's Day, so I tried to put
my feelings into making these.
<PAGE>
Since, you know, I'm not really the best with
words. I hope you understand, too. Later.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here. I really am thankful for all your support.
Later, then.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really liked what you got for me for Valentine's
Day, so I brought you this as a token of my
thanks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...If you know what I mean. Ciao, babe.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks a lot for the Valentine's Day present. I
made this for you as a little way to say thanks.
Share it with your family, okay?
<PAGE>
Catch you later. And hey, say hi to
<CHARANAME0> for me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The present you gave me on White Day was
excellent. I made this as a token of my thanks.
Enjoy it with that in mind, won't you?
<PAGE>
Well then, I must be off. Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a token of my thanks for your care and
support. Enjoy it with your family, would you?
Well then, good day.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The dessert you made for me on White Day was
delicious. Consider this a token of my thanks.
<PAGE>
It may be a touch on the sweet side, though. If
you know what I mean.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, I had better be going.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The dessert you made for me on White Day was
delicious, so I thought I'd try my hand at making
something for you. I hope your family enjoys it.
<PAGE>
Well, time to be going then. Good day.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks so much for what you got me on White
Day. I worked really hard to make this for you. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>D-don't stare at me like that. A-a-anyways, I've
gotta run. Byeeee!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this for you as a token of my thanks for
everything you've done. You can share it with
your family, too.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The present you got for me on White Day was
really yummy, so in return, I made these just for
you.
<PAGE>
If you want, I can make them for you again
sometime. But anyway, I need to go. Bye-bye!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for the yummy present on White Day.
I wanted to give you something just as tasty in
return, so...here you go!
<PAGE>
Stop by the Safari again sometime. We'd love to
see you again. Bye-bye!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for the lovely present on White Day. I
made this for you in return, so I hope you will
enjoy it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But do keep in mind, it is a dessert, so please
don't eat it all at once. I'd hate to be the cause of
poor dietary choices.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I made this for you in thanks for the lovely
present you gave me on White Day. Please share
it with <CHARANAME0>.
<PAGE>
Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The present you gave me on White Day was
really tasty.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So I, er...really felt like making something for
you. I hope you like it.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll catch you later.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not like this is just for the holiday, but you
did get me something for White Day, so I made
this for you in return.
<PAGE>
I hope you and your family enjoy it. See you
'round.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Hey! You don't have any space in your
bag! Oh well. I guess I'll just put it right here,
then.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems like your bag is full right now. Well
then, I'll just set it over here. Enjoy it at your
leisure.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, seems like your bag is full, so I'll just put it
over here.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. Your bag is full. I guess I will set it over
here, then.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your bag is full. Mind if I just put it here?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like your bag's full, though. Lemme just
set it here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness! Your bag is full. I guess I'll just have
to set it here for the time being. But do not leave
it here! Put it away where it belongs.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. It looks like your bag is full. I'll just set it
over here, then.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops! Your bag is full, so I can't give it to you.
I'll put it over here and you can take it whenever
you're able.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh-oh! Your bag is full, so I'll set it over here for
you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems your bag is full. I shall set it here, then.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wellll...I can't really give it to you when your
bag's full like that. I'll just put it here.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey!
<PAGE>
Seein' as today's White Day, I brought you a
present as thanks for what you got me last time!
I hope you like it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings. Your timing is perfect.
<PAGE>
I was just thinking I'd give you a present in
return for the thoughtful gift you gave me for
Valentine's Day. I hope you like it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey there! Stopping by for a visit? Perfect
timing!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Here! Just a little thanks from me for the
sweetness you dropped on me for Valentine's
Day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Do you know what today is?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's White Day, of course. I have a little
something for you in thanks for the gift you gave
me on Valentine's Day. 
<PAGE>
Here. I hope you like it.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi. Today's White Day, y'know. Since you got
me something for Valentine's Day, I got
something for you this time.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there! I know it's not much, but...
<PAGE>
Since today's White Day, I wanted to bring you a
present. After all, you got me something for
Valentine's Day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day. It so happens that I have a present for
you.
<PAGE>
Why the funny look? You did give me a gift on
White Day, and today is Valentine's Day. You do
remember that, correct?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey there. Today's Valentine's Day, and since
you were thoughtful enough to give me
something on White Day...here. This is for you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hiiii! Sorry to bug you...
<PAGE>
Since today's Valentine's Day and you were
sweet enough to give me something on White
Day, I brought you a present! I hope you like it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heya!
<PAGE>
Today's Valentine's Day. Since you gave me a
present on White Day, I wanted to give you a
present today.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, it's Angela. I have something to give to
you.
<PAGE>
Since you were kind enough to give me a
present on White Day, I have brought you
something today.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi. Er, h-here. You got me a present for White
Day, so I, um, got you something for today. I
hope you like it.
